original_text:
Knight’s Keep
Quando bisogna cambiare la propria Slot Machine preferita a cui affidarsi per scommettere e vincere un sacco di soldi, ci si ritrova a cercare per ore e ore su Internet. Devi fare in modo che tutte le percentuali di vincita siano belle alte, in modo da avere la possibilità di guadagnare durante le tue giocate.
Ma non è tutto. La Slot Machine scelta deve anche essere affine ai tuoi gusti. Sennò non ci sarebbe alcun piacere nel giocare e ti stuferesti subito.
Se ami un po’ le slot retrò, di quelle a cui si giocava qualche anno fa nei casinò fisici, e vuoi goderti una nuova esperienza di gioco data dall’intrattenimento del 3D, forse abbiamo la Slot Machine per te.
Continua a leggere per scoprire tutto su Knight’s Keep.
Una grafica retrò ma in 3D
Knight’s Keep, la Slot Machine prodotta da WMS (Williams Interactive), non è altro che l’esperienza online della famosa slot fisica che popolava fino a qualche anno fa tutti i casinò.
Avrai a che fare con re, regine, cavalieri, e castelli. Tra i simboli ci sono anche spade e diamanti, in modo da dare una sorta di aria retrò al gioco.
Grazie all’incredibile grafica 3D, ti sembrerà realmente di trovarti all’interno del casinò, ma contemporaneamente di essere immerso in un mondo medievale, oscuro ma allo stesso tempo elettrizzante.
Se le animazioni di questo gioco sono così interessanti, è soprattutto grazie al motore di gioco Real Boost, che ormai viene impiegato per le Slot Machine migliori sul mercato.
Se la tua passione è il medioevo, con i cavalieri e le regine da salvare, quindi, non ti resta altro che provare Knight’s Keep.
Prima, però, devi conoscere tutte le funzioni e i bonus che puoi ottenere!
Le funzioni e i bonus
Se la grafica può essere in qualche modo retrò, i bonus e le funzioni sono decisamente più moderni.
La configurazione è quella tipica di WMS, con le 192 linee di pagamento, decisamente maggiori della media. Naturalmente, linee di pagamento maggiori significa una più elevata probabilità di fare un sacco di soldi.
I simboli che puoi trovare, naturalmente, sono legati al mondo medievale. Il cavaliere nero rappresenta un moltiplicatore 10x, il re moltiplica la posta per 300, mentre la regina per 250. La corona moltiplica la quantità scommessa per 150 mentre lo scettro per 100. Si tratta di bonus veramente importanti, che ti permettono di ottenere un sacco di soldi.
Il cavaliere nero, oltre ad essere un moltiplicatore, è anche il simbolo Wild. Si va a sostituire all’interno della linea di pagamento rappresentando una qualsiasi figura, in modo da ottenere una combinazione vincente.
Il bonus free spins, invece, a seconda di quante volte capiterà tra i rulli 3 e 6, porterà ad una quantità di giri gratis da 5 a 25.
Altre Slot Machine simili a questa
Se ti è piaciuto il contesto medievale, devi sapere che quelli di WMS hanno prodotto altre due Slot Machine molto interessanti con cavalieri e castelli. La prima è Black Knight, con 5 rulli per un totale di 30 linee di pagamento. Ha una grafica in 3D, quindi può essere ideale per chi cerca belle immagini, ma non l’esperienza tridimensionale.
Poi c’è Black Knight 2, il sequel della Slot Machine precedente. Non c’è stata una grande evoluzione, ma WMS ha aumentato la probabilità di ottenere dei simboli nelle linee di pagamento.

raw_translation.response:
Knight's Keep

As an experienced gambler, when it comes to changing your favorite slot machine to bet and win a lot of money, you spend hours and hours searching on the internet. You must ensure that all winning percentages are high so you have the chance to earn during your plays.

But that's not all. The chosen slot machine must also be in line with your tastes. Otherwise, there would be no pleasure in playing and you would soon become bored.

If you love retro slots, like those played a few years ago in physical casinos, and want to enjoy a new gaming experience that combines entertainment and 3D, perhaps we have the slot machine for you.

Continue reading to discover everything about Knight's Keep.

Retro but 3D graphics

Knight's Keep, the slot machine produced by WMS (Williams Interactive), is nothing more than the online experience of the famous physical slot that until a few years ago populated all casinos.

You will deal with kings, queens, knights, and castles. Among the symbols there are also swords and diamonds, to give a sort of retro air to the game.

Thanks to the incredible 3D graphics, you will really feel like you are inside the casino but at the same time immersed in a medieval world, dark but at the same time electrifying.

If the animations of this game are so interesting, it is mainly thanks to the Real Boost game engine, which is now used for the best slot machines on the market.

If your passion is the Middle Ages, with knights and queens to save, then you just have to try Knight's Keep. But first, you need to know all the functions and bonuses you can get!

Functions and bonuses

If the graphics can be somewhat retro, the bonuses and functions are decidedly more modern.

The configuration is typical of WMS, with 192 paylines, significantly higher than the average. Of course, more paylines mean a higher chance of making a lot of money.

The symbols you can find, of course, are related to the medieval world. The black knight represents a 10x multiplier, the king multiplies the stake by 300, while the queen multiplies it by 250. The crown multiplies the amount bet by 150 while the scepter by 100. These are truly important bonuses that allow you to get a lot of money.

The black knight, in addition to being a multiplier, is also the Wild symbol. It can be substituted within the payline representing any figure, in order to obtain a winning combination.

The free spins bonus, on the other hand, depending on how many times it appears between reels 3 and 6, will lead to a quantity of free spins from 5 to 25.

Other slot machines similar to this

If you liked the medieval context, you should know that WMS has produced two other very interesting slot machines with knights and castles. The first is Black Knight, with 5 reels for a total of 30 paylines. It has a 3D graphics, so it can be ideal for those looking for beautiful images, but not the 3D experience.

Then there is Black Knight 2, the sequel to the previous slot machine. There has not been a great evolution, but WMS has increased the probability of getting symbols in paylines.

Review: Knight's Keep

As an experienced gambler, when it comes to changing your favorite slot machine to bet and win a lot of money, you spend hours and hours searching on the internet. You must ensure that all winning percentages are high so you have the chance to earn during your plays.

But that's not all. The chosen slot machine must also be in line with your tastes. Otherwise, there would be no pleasure in playing and you would soon become bored.

If you love retro slots, like those played a few years ago in physical casinos, and want to enjoy a new gaming experience that combines entertainment and 3D, perhaps we have the slot machine for you.

Continue reading to discover everything about Knight's Keep.

Retro but 3D graphics

Knight's Keep, the slot machine produced by WMS (Williams Interactive), is nothing more than the online experience of the famous physical slot that until a few years ago populated all casinos.

You will deal with kings, queens, knights, and castles. Among the symbols there are also swords and diamonds, to give a sort of retro air to the game.

Thanks to the incredible 3D graphics, you will really feel like you are inside the casino but at the same time immersed in a medieval world, dark but at the same time electrifying.

If the animations of this game are so interesting, it is mainly thanks to the Real Boost game engine, which is now used for the best slot machines on the market.

If your passion is the Middle Ages, with knights and queens to save, then you just have to try Knight's Keep. But first, you need to know all the functions and bonuses you can get!

Functions and bonuses

If the graphics can be somewhat retro, the bonuses and functions are decidedly more modern.

The configuration is typical of WMS, with 192 paylines, significantly higher than the average. Of course, more paylines mean a higher chance of making a lot of money.

The symbols you can find, of course, are related to the medieval world. The black knight represents a 10x multiplier, the king multiplies the stake by 300, while the queen multiplies it by 250. The crown multiplies the amount bet by 150 while the scepter by 100. These are truly important bonuses that allow you to get a lot of money.

The black knight, in addition to being a multiplier, is also the Wild symbol. It can be substituted within the payline representing any figure, in order to obtain a winning combination.

The free spins bonus, on the other hand, depending on how many times it appears between reels 3 and 6, will lead to a quantity of free spins from 5 to 25.

Other slot machines similar to this

If you liked the medieval context, you should know that WMS has produced two other very interesting slot machines with knights and castles. The first is Black Knight, with 5 reels for a total of 30 paylines. It has a 3D graphics, so it can be ideal for those looking for beautiful images, but not the 3D experience.

Then there is Black Knight 2, the sequel to the previous slot machine. There has not been a great evolution, but WMS has increased the probability of getting symbols in paylines.

Knight's Keep, the slot machine produced by WMS (Williams Interactive), is nothing more than the online experience of the famous physical slot that until a few years ago populated all casinos.

You will deal with kings, queens, knights, and castles. Among the symbols there are also swords and diamonds, to give a sort of retro air to the game.

Thanks to the incredible 3D graphics, you will really feel like you are inside the casino but at the same time immersed in a medieval world, dark but at the same time electrifying.

If the animations of this game are so interesting, it is mainly thanks to the Real Boost game engine, which is now used for the best slot machines on the market.

If your passion is the Middle Ages, with knights and queens to save, then you just have to try Knight's Keep. But first, you need to know all the functions and bonuses you can get!

Functions and bonuses

If the graphics can be somewhat retro, the bonuses and functions are decidedly more modern.

The configuration is typical of WMS, with 192 paylines, significantly higher than the average. Of course, more paylines mean a higher chance of making a lot of money.

The symbols you can find, of course, are related to the medieval world. The black knight represents a 10x multiplier, the king multiplies the stake by 300, while the queen multiplies it by 250. The crown multiplies the amount bet by 150 while the scepter by 100. These are truly important bonuses that allow you to get a lot of money.

The black knight, in addition to being a multiplier, is also the Wild symbol. It can be substituted within the payline representing any figure, in order to obtain a winning combination.

The free spins bonus, on the other hand, depending on how many times it appears between reels 3 and 6, will lead to a quantity of free spins from 5 to 25.

Other slot machines similar to this

If you liked the medieval context, you should know that WMS has produced two other very interesting slot machines with knights and castles. The first is Black Knight, with 5 reels for a total of 30 paylines. It has a 3D graphics, so it can be ideal for those looking for beautiful images, but not the 3D experience.

Then there is Black Knight 2, the sequel to the previous slot machine. There has not been a great evolution, but WMS has increased the probability of getting symbols in paylines.
